item.title: Eglifier V.2

item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

[quote=“nade, post:6, topic:114534”]Why post your first program here? How does this help anybody?

Puts and GetChar?

  puts("Welcome to the Eglifier by Santa Claus!");// Eglifier
  puts("I hope that you find a use for this....");// Eglifier
  puts("because at the moment i have no idea...");// Eglifier

Very descriptive, useful comments.

If you are trying to show off: you failed.

Thanks for wasting my time.[/quote]

People also post there codes to get some feedback and hopefully improve. However, yes, I agree with you that those comments are idiotic.

Read full topic

item.title: Eglifier V.2
item.dc:creator: @Santa_Claus Santa Claus
item.description:
@Santa_Claus wrote:

[code]#include
using namespace std;

int main ()
{
puts("____________________________________________________\n\n");
puts(“Welcome to the Eglifier by Santa Claus!”);// Eglifier
puts(“I hope that you find a use for this…”);// Eglifier
puts(“because at the moment i have no idea…”);// Eglifier
getchar();
getchar();

puts(“\n\n");
puts(“Creator of this Feature is Santa Claus! Thank You”);
puts("\n\n”);

int name;

printf(“How old are you? “);// Eglifier
scanf (”%s”,&name);// Eglifier
printf(“You’re %s years old thats cool im 15\n\n”,&name);// Eglifier
getchar();
getchar();

printf("Whats your favourite food?   ");// Eglifier

scanf ("%s",&name);// Eglifier
printf(“Your favourite food is %s, mine too!\n\n”,&name);// Eglifier
getchar();
getchar();

printf("Where you from?   ");// Eglifier

scanf ("%s",&name);// Eglifier
printf(“Your from %s, sweet thats cool!\n\n”,&name);// Eglifier
getchar();
getchar();
getchar();

puts(“\n\n");
puts(“Creator of the next Feature is Lin! Thank You”);
puts("\n\n”);

puts(“\n\n");
puts(“Thanks for downloading or using! Much Appriciated!”);
puts("\n\n”);

int age;
int year = 2007;
int futureyear;
int added;
int yeartwo;
int finalage;
int twoadded;
puts(“Welcome to this Agifier by Lin!\n\n”);
puts(“Please enter your age.\n\n”);
scanf("%d", &age);
puts(“Now enter a future year.\n\n”);
scanf("%d", &futureyear);
added = age + futureyear;
age + futureyear;
finalage = added - year;
futureyear - year;
twoadded = finalage - age;
finalage - age;
printf(“You will be %d in the year %d\n\n”, finalage, futureyear);
puts(“Press Enter to continue.\n\n”);
getchar();
main();

return 0;

}[/code]

Still adding peoples stuff to the Eglifier Post yours here…
